Text:
No encoding info (Vital)
Test download shows that although it is in 320kbits, it's only encoded in lousy Joint stereo, so loss of channel seperation and high frequencies.
These tracks are readily available in Stereo and dual channel (true stereo) as well as FLAC

And if you want to go one better mate and sound like a real idiot.. you can also get it 1411Kbps stock standard.. But can you find the covers in stereo as well.... moron :) 
[just enjoy what's on offer]
